mapper.select: /*[AdminProductionApi_SQL.xml].[getProductionCnt] */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsp_production tp LEFT OUTER JOIN tsp_image ti ON tp.idx = ti.type_idx WHERE ti.type_name = 'production' AND tp.visible = 'Y'

/*[AdminProductionApi_SQL.xml].[getProductionList] */ SELECT RNUM, idx, title, description, visible, adminName, creator, createTime, updater, updateTime, file_mask, file_path, file_name, new_file_name FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RNUM, tp.idx, title, description, tp.visible, (SELECT name FROM app_user_info WHERE user_seq = creator) AS adminName, creator, create_time AS createTime, updater, update_time AS updateTime, concat('/upload/',file_mask) AS file_mask, file_path, file_name, concat('/upload/',file_name) AS new_file_name FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) temp, tsp_production tp LEFT OUTER JOIN tsp_image ti ON tp.idx = ti.type_idx WHERE ti.type_name = 'production' AND tp.visible = 'Y' AND ti.visible = 'Y' ORDER BY tp.idx ASC ) AS A WHERE A.RNUM <= #{startPage}*#{size} AND A.RNUM > (#{startPage}-1)*#{size}

/*[AdminProductionApi_SQL.xml].[getProductionInfo] */ SELECT tp.idx, title, description, tp.visible, (SELECT name FROM app_user_info WHERE user_seq = creator) AS adminName, creator, create_time AS createTime, updater, update_time AS updateTime, concat('/upload/',file_mask) AS file_mask, file_path, file_name FROM tsp_production tp LEFT OUTER JOIN tsp_image ti ON tp.idx = ti.type_idx WHERE ti.type_name = 'production' AND tp.visible = 'Y' AND ti.visible = 'Y' AND tp.idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tsp_production(title, description, visible, creator, create_time, updater, update_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{visible}, '1', now(), '1', now())
mapper.update: UPDATE tsp_production SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, visible = #{visible}, updater = #{updater}, update_time = NOW() WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.delete: UPDATE tsp_production SET visible = #{visible}, update_time = NOW() WHERE idx = #{idx}
